name: EventKaddy
overview:
EventKaddy - Event Guides Made Mobile

Generate revenue, green your conference and improve your attendeesâ€™ experience.

EventKaddy is a mobile distribution platform designed to enhance the attendee experience while providing new benefits to exhibitors and a new revenue stream for event organizers. EventKaddy features session and exhibitor listings, videos, interactive maps, networking tools and much more in an easy to use and elegant package.
